entry.title: Libbitcoin for Core people
entry.summary: The email provides an invitation for a deeper engagement with the libbitcoin project, specifically targeting those interested in its node progress. The developers behind libbitcoin are encouraging participation in two main forums: their Slack channel and weekly development meetings. For those looking to get involved or seeking more information about the project's advancements, joining the [libbitcoin Slack channel](https://libbitcoin.slack.com/join/shared_invite/enQtNDgxMjQxODg0NTM1LTFhYzNhYjYxYTg1OTc0NGQ0OWQxY2ZiYWI5ODc1ZmFjZjEyNGZkNWQwM2JiMzk0YjhkMDc0MjkxOTgwMzQ0ZDM/shared-invite/email) is recommended as a first step. Additionally, attending the weekly developer meetings offers a direct line to discussions and updates on the project's node progress, providing an interactive platform for those deeply interested in libbitcoin's development.
